title: Tf Are These Shitass Roles Man

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Attack a player each night. They die if they are one of your targets, and live if they aren't.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You hate all roles between role 3000 and 3285. At the start of the game, you are informed of all roles in the game whose post number is within that range. The players with these roles are your targets.
- You have Basic defense until the first time you are attacked.
- If you attack someone who would die to your attack, literally nothing can prevent them from dying unless you are roleblocked.  You do not interact with any ability that would stop you from killing, except for roleblockers.
- Players who are converted into a role that would be your target do *not* become your targets.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: End the game with everyone you can kill dead.
